title: Geordie Stories: Charlotte's New Baby
overview: Geordie Stories: Charlotte's New Baby will follow Television Royalty Charlotte Crosby as she and her fiancé Jake Ankers prepare for the arrival of their second child. Fans have followed Charlotte at every stage of her young adult life, and this series will give viewers a glimpse into her favourite role yet – being a mother!This series will take fans behind the scenes as the clock ticks down to Charlotte and Jake's daughter Alba getting a sibling. With a slammed schedule, the parenting pressures and juggle has never been busier. Fresh from landing her dream job as the boss in the upcoming Aussie Shore, we will watch Charlotte balance her glamorous work and energetic life filter free as she goes from bump to birth. Viewers will even get to see some familiar Geordie faces along the way as well as fan favourites Letitia and Gary Crosby and dogs Baby, Rhubarb and Banana, who have now moved into Charlotte and Jake's house while their house is being renovated!
